full_description:
Walton WMWO-M23SCD 23L Convection Microwave Oven

The Walton WMWO-M23SCD 23L Convection Microwave Oven is a stylish and versatile oven that allows you to easily cook, grill, and bake a variety of dishes. The Walton Microwave Oven has a multi-function feature that lets you select between microwave, grill, convection, and combination modes. The microwave mode rapidly and evenly warms, reheats, or defrosts food. The grill mode is used to brown, crisp, or toast food while adding flavor. Convection mode bakes, roasts, or broils food at a uniform temperature and with a crispy texture. For faster and better results, the combo mode combines the microwave and grill capabilities. The stainless steel chamber of the Walton WMWO-M23SCD 23-Liters Convection Microwave Oven is both robust and easy to clean. You can grill food more conveniently with the complimentary grill rack that comes with the Walton Convection Oven. With a 23 L capacity, the Walton WMWO-M23SCD Convection Microwave Oven is large enough to cook for a large family or gathering. With its ten automatic cooking settings (a1–a10), you can prepare a variety of meals with only one touch. Additionally, it features five power level settings that let you modify the temperature and strength of various foods. It has an intuitive digital control panel that is simple to operate. Additionally, it features a timer and a weight control button that let you adjust the duration and weight to suit various recipes. Additionally, it includes a rapid, weight, and time defrost function that thaws frozen meals quickly. Moreover, it features a rapid start feature that enables one-touch cooking. Additionally, it contains an LED display that indicates the settings and cooking status.

Buy Walton WMWO-M23SCD 23L Convection Microwave Oven From Star Tech

Walton WMWO-G30SCT 30L Convection Microwave Oven

The Walton WMWO-G30SCT 30L Convection Microwave Oven is an innovative and flexible oven designed to easily cook, grill, and bake a variety of dishes. It has a 30-liter capacity, which is sufficient for cooking for a family or a party. The Walton Convection Oven has a digital control panel for convenient operation. You can choose between microwave, grill, and convection modes in their multi-function oven. The microwave mode rapidly and evenly warms, reheats, or defrosts food. The grill mode is used to brown, crisp, or toast food while adding flavor. Convection mode bakes, roasts, or broils food at a uniform temperature and with a crispy texture. The Walton WMWO-G30SCT 30L Convection Microwave Oven boasts a dependable electronic control and preset recipes feature that allows you to choose the best settings and time for various recipes. You may also use the smart display to monitor the cooking process and make any adjustments. The Walton WMWO-G30SCT 30L Convection Oven includes ten automatic cooking modes that allow you to prepare a variety of foods with a single click. The Walton 30L Microwave Oven comes with a turntable and trays for consistent cooking and optimal outcomes. The oven also contains a timer and a digital clock, allowing you to thaw frozen food in minutes while keeping track of the time.

full_description:
Walton WMWO-WG30ESLR 30L Convection Microwave Oven

The Walton WMWO-WG30ESLR 30L Convection Microwave Oven is an innovative and flexible oven designed to easily cook, grill, and bake a variety of dishes. It has a 30-liter capacity, which is sufficient for cooking for a family or a party. The Walton Convection Oven has a control panel for convenient operation. You can choose between microwave, grill, combo, and convection modes in their multi-function oven. The microwave mode rapidly and evenly warms, reheats, or defrosts food. The grill mode is used to brown, crisp, or toast food while adding flavor. For faster and better results, their combo mode combines microwave and grill operations. Convection mode bakes, roasts, or broils food at a uniform temperature and with a crispy texture. The Walton WMWO-WG30ESLR 30L Convection Microwave Oven boasts a dependable electronic control and preset recipes feature that allows you to choose the best settings and time for various recipes. You may also use the smart display to monitor the cooking process and make any adjustments. The Walton WMWO-WG30ESLR 30L Convection Oven includes nine automatic cooking modes that allow you to prepare a variety of foods with a single click. The 30-liter convection oven also offers 10 power level settings, allowing you to regulate the power and temperature based on the dish. The Walton 30L Microwave Oven comes with a turntable and trays for consistent cooking and optimal outcomes. The oven also contains a timer and a digital clock, allowing you to thaw frozen food in minutes while keeping track of the time. Additionally, their safety child lock option prevents youngsters from opening or operating the device by accident. The nonstick inner covering keeps food from sticking and simplifies washing.
